branchCategory.name: IC, Controller for Electro-Pneumatic Regulator
branchCategory.description: Series IC, controller for electro-pneumatic regulator converts digital input signal into analog output signal. It has a maximum 10 bit parallel input signal and a 4 point preset output pressure.  This series is mainly used in combination with the series ITV0000 w/o a display function.
